result.markdown:
---
title: "Toy Post: Per-Post Nix Dependencies"
author: "Bruno Rodrigues"
date: "2025-12-31"
categories: [nix]
---



This is a toy post demonstrating per-post Nix dependencies.

This post has a corresponding `2025-12-31-toy-post.nix` file that adds
the `purrr` package to the environment.



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(purrr)

# Use purrr to demonstrate it's available
result <- map_dbl(1:5, ~ .x^2)
print(result)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1]  1  4  9 16 25
```


:::
:::



The `purrr` package is not in the base `posts/default.nix`, but it's
available here because of the post-specific `.nix` file!
